textAfterTable: About Ennore Coke Ltd. Ennore Coke Ltd., incorporated in the year 1985, is a Small Cap company (having a market cap of Rs 15.35 Cr.) operating in Mining sector. Ennore Coke Ltd. key Products/Revenue Segments include Coke which contributed Rs 362.64 Cr to Sales Value (77.33% of Total Sales), Coal which contributed Rs 102.72 Cr to Sales Value (21.90% of Total Sales), Power which contributed Rs 3.29 Cr to Sales Value (0.70% of Total Sales), Other Operating Revenue which contributed Rs 0.24 Cr to Sales Value (0.05% of Total Sales), for the year ending 31-Mar-2014. For the quarter ended 31-Mar-2015, the company has reported a Standalone sales of Rs. 158.14 Cr., up 249.77% from last quarter Sales of Rs. 45.21 Cr. and down -13.85% from last year same quarter Sales of Rs. 183.56 Cr. Company has reported net profit after tax of Rs. -12.09 Cr. in latest quarter. The company’s management includes Mr.G Natarajan, Mr.K U Sivadas, Mr.M Aravind Subramanian, Mr.R Ramakrishnan, Mr.A Ganesh, Mr.M Natarajan, Mr.M Saravanan, Mr.M Saravanan. Company has Sreedhar, Suresh & Rajagopalan as its auditors. As on 30-Jun-2015, the company has a total of 15,500,000 shares outstanding.
